Laredo.XEGNK-AM:
XEGNK-AM (branded as La Tamaulipeca) is a Mexican Regional Music format AM radio station that serves the Laredo, Texas, United States and Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, Mexico border area.


== History ==
XEGNK received its concession on June 26, 1962. It was owned by Guillermo Nuñez Keith.
